description.value:
Frequency once per day

Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud.

You become @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} for a number of rounds equal to half your level. You can't use this concealment to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Hide]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sneak]{Sneak}, as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious.

While Nanite Shroud is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.
